# Page Sands — pagesands.com

## About
Page Sands is an AI-first GTM (Go-to-Market) strategist and film photographer based in Charleston, SC. Founder and principal of SandsDX, an AI-first GTM consulting practice.

## Professional Focus
- AI-first go-to-market strategy for growth-stage SaaS companies (Series A through C)
- Demand generation, pipeline operations, and marketing operations
- AI-driven workflows and automation for B2B marketing teams
- Website modernization and account-based marketing (ABM)

## Consulting Practice
SandsDX (https://www.sandsdx.com/) provides AI-first GTM consulting for B2B teams, helping them scale by removing friction through simplicity and systems thinking.

## Photography
Film photography practice covering 35mm, medium format, and large format. Collections include Singles, People, Places, and Urban categories. Portfolio at https://artofwanderingabout.com.

## Pages
- / — Homepage with overview, current work, FAQ, and newsletter signup
- /business — Business and consulting services page
- /photography — Film photography portfolio and collections
- /resources — Articles and guides on GTM strategy, SEO, and AI
- /contact — Contact form for inquiries
- /articles/charleston-seo-llm-optimization — Guide to SEO and LLM optimization for Charleston businesses

## Location
Charleston, South Carolina, United States
